text.intro: Graph shows the network of Youtube videos connected and stemming from the source video - Markaz Besar DPP FPI Petamburan di serang polisi (Markaz FPI Diserang), varied by betweenness centrality and network degree. Curved lines (edges) on the graphs show direction - clockwise edges denote source youtube video connecting to target youtube video and vice versa.
text.title: Network Analysis of Youtube Video: Markaz FPI Diserang
